snippet: An annual statewide event functions as a sort of “America’s Most Wanted” for an unromanticized subset of the Texas outlaw: the misdemeanor kind.
abstract: Late February brings the Great Texas Warrant Roundup, an annual statewide event in which dozens of law enforcement agencies across the state take to the airwaves and to the streets seeking out, apprehending and otherwise rounding up Texans who have ignored their unpaid speeding tickets and other minor infractions for too long.
lead_paragraph: An annual statewide event functions as a sort of “America’s Most Wanted” for an unromanticized subset of the Texas outlaw: the misdemeanor kind.

headline.seo: Great Texas Warrant Roundup Roots Out Misdemeanor Offenders
headline.main: Across Texas, Police Root Out Transgressors of a Mild Sort
headline.print_headline: Across Texas, Police Root Out Transgressors Of a Mild Sort
